About the game (The Devil Inside*):

ul.li: Ratings: IGDB Meta 70 % (1 sources) / IGDB User 78 % (6 sources)

Description: The Devil Inside is a third-person action horror game in which Dave, a hero with a dark secret, is compelled to participate in a cruel television reality show in which he has to please the audience by killing monsters. Dave has a female demonic alter ego called Deva. The player can transform between Dave and Deva at certain places in the stages. Dave mostly uses guns equipped with laser sights. Deva, on the other hand, casts spells that require magic points, which can be restored by consuming souls left from defeated enemies, as well as float in the air and regenerate her health under specific circumstances.

Earn a reputation as a tough enforcer, daring getaway driver, and deadly hitman in your quest for respect and power within the Salieri Family.

div.p: Claim it now for free on itch.io.
About the game (Maze*):

ul.li: Description: Maze originated or disseminated a number of concepts used in thousands of games to follow, and is considered one of the earliest examples of, or progenitor of, a first-person shooter. Uncertainty exists over its exact release date, with some accounts placing it before Spasim, the earliest first-person shooter with a known time of publication. Gameplay is simple by later standards. Players wander around a maze, being capable of moving backward or forwards, turning right or left in 90-degree increments, and peeking through doorways. The game also uses simple tile-based movement, where the player moves from square to square. Other players are seen as eyeballs. When a player sees another player, they can shoot or otherwise negatively affect them. Players gain points for shooting other players, and lose them for being shot. Some versions (like the X11 port) had a cheat mode where the player running the server could see the other players' positions on the map. Occasionally in some versions, a duck also appears in the passage.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

Every night, in many places along the coast of Southern Australia, penguin colonies return en masse from their daily hunting expeditions, under the cover of dusk, to their onshore burrows.
On Phillip Island, this is known as the "penguin parade."
Guide a penguin home to its burrow as night sets in.

About the game (Home Game*):

ul.li: Description: Home Game is about the hermit at home. Explore town, find ways into buildings, die horribly, fail utterly, cash cans for change, regret your decisions in life. The game features magic spells, a cat, rude people, demons and death. You can pass through solid objects. You can help end this world. You may grow flowers in your garden, as well as feed birds. It has rain SFX.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

About the game (Home Game 2*):

ul.li: Description: Home Game 2 is about the hermit selling his home. Explore town, hop fences to enter yards, acquire cursed swords, ruin your mood by mis-using magic spells, die over and over and over again. Never find your way. This hectic masocore features scrolls, portals, demons and death. Drink coffee across 8 levels and try to survive your stalker. Achieve a perfect homesense score. Can you reach the truest ending?
